title: ping help
body: So I recently moved and I for the time being am suck on wifi. I went to play a game and my ping was unstable, so i got my mac and made a custom so both accounts i have are in it. both computers are on the same network both using wifi but my PC ping is unstable and normally high while my mac will stay a constant 17. what could be causing this?

replies.body:
The problem could be your wireless card in your PC. A good place to start would be updating the driver for your wireless card either by the vendor's website for the card itself, or by grabbing the driver off your Manufacturer's website. 

Let me know if this helped.
